00001 #include <assert.h>
00002 #include <math.h>

00008 // The modf function doesn't seem very intuitive, so I'm writing this 
00009 // function that simply returns the fractional part of the float value
00010 float fraction(float v)
00011 {
00012         float intPart;
00013         return modff(v, &intPart);
00014 }
00015 
00016 void RegisterScriptMath_Native(asIScriptEngine *engine)
00017 {
00018         int r;
00019 
00020         // Trigonometric functions
00021         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float cos(float)", asFUNCTION(cosf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00022         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float sin(float)", asFUNCTION(sinf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00023         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float tan(float)", asFUNCTION(tanf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00024 
00025         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float acos(float)", asFUNCTION(acosf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00026         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float asin(float)", asFUNCTION(asinf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00027         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float atan(float)", asFUNCTION(atanf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00028 
00029         // Hyberbolic functions
00030         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float cosh(float)", asFUNCTION(coshf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00031         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float sinh(float)", asFUNCTION(sinhf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00032         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float tanh(float)", asFUNCTION(tanhf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00033 
00034         // Exponential and logarithmic functions
00035         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float log(float)", asFUNCTION(logf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00036         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float log10(float)", asFUNCTION(log10f), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00037 
00038         // Power functions
00039         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float pow(float, float)", asFUNCTION(powf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00040         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float sqrt(float)", asFUNCTION(sqrtf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00041 
00042         // Nearest integer, absolute value, and remainder functions
00043         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float ceil(float)", asFUNCTION(ceilf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00044         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float abs(float)", asFUNCTION(fabsf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00045         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float floor(float)", asFUNCTION(floorf), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00046         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float fraction(float)", asFUNCTION(fraction), asCALL_CDECL); assert( r >= 0 );
00047 
00048         // Don't register modf because AngelScript already supports the % operator
00049 }
00050 
00051 // This macro creates simple generic wrappers for functions of type 'float func(float)'
00052 #define GENERICff(x) \
00053 void x##_generic(asIScriptGeneric *gen) \
00054 { \
00055         float f = *(float*)gen->GetAddressOfArg(0); \
00056         *(float*)gen->GetReturnPointer() = x(f); \
00057 }
00058 
00059 GENERICff(cosf)
00060 GENERICff(sinf)
00061 GENERICff(tanf)
00062 GENERICff(acosf)
00063 GENERICff(asinf)
00064 GENERICff(atanf)
00065 GENERICff(coshf)
00066 GENERICff(sinhf)
00067 GENERICff(tanhf)
00068 GENERICff(logf)
00069 GENERICff(log10f)
00070 GENERICff(sqrtf)
00071 GENERICff(ceilf)
00072 GENERICff(fabsf)
00073 GENERICff(floorf)
00074 GENERICff(fraction)
00075 
00076 void powf_generic(asIScriptGeneric *gen)
00077 {
00078         float f1 = *(float*)gen->GetAddressOfArg(0);
00079         float f2 = *(float*)gen->GetAddressOfArg(1);
00080         *(float*)gen->GetReturnPointer() = powf(f1, f2);
00081 }
00082 
00083 void RegisterScriptMath_Generic(asIScriptEngine *engine)
00084 {
00085         int r;
00086 
00087         // Trigonometric functions
00088         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float cos(float)", asFUNCTION(cosf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00089         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float sin(float)", asFUNCTION(sinf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00090         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float tan(float)", asFUNCTION(tanf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00091 
00092         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float acos(float)", asFUNCTION(acosf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00093         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float asin(float)", asFUNCTION(asinf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00094         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float atan(float)", asFUNCTION(atanf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00095 
00096         // Hyberbolic functions
00097         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float cosh(float)", asFUNCTION(coshf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00098         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float sinh(float)", asFUNCTION(sinhf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00099         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float tanh(float)", asFUNCTION(tanhf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00100 
00101         // Exponential and logarithmic functions
00102         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float log(float)", asFUNCTION(logf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00103         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float log10(float)", asFUNCTION(log10f_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00104 
00105         // Power functions
00106         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float pow(float, float)", asFUNCTION(powf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00107         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float sqrt(float)", asFUNCTION(sqrtf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00108 
00109         // Nearest integer, absolute value, and remainder functions
00110         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float ceil(float)", asFUNCTION(ceilf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00111         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float abs(float)", asFUNCTION(fabsf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00112         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float floor(float)", asFUNCTION(floorf_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00113         r = engine->RegisterGlobalFunction("float fraction(float)", asFUNCTION(fraction_generic), asCALL_GENERIC); assert( r >= 0 );
00114 
00115         // Don't register modf because AngelScript already supports the % operator
00116 }
00117 
00118 void RegisterScriptMath(asIScriptEngine *engine)
00119 {
00120         if( strstr(asGetLibraryOptions(), "AS_MAX_PORTABILITY") )
00121                 RegisterScriptMath_Generic(engine);
00122         else
00123                 RegisterScriptMath_Native(engine);
00124 }
